issue.title: Translation work
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

With the great new functionalities coming with version 2.1, quite a lot of UI was redesigned or extented.

What about the translation file ? I guess all new UI words are in English at least.
This is what I see here : http://forge.easysdi.org/projects/monitor/repository/diff/joomla/1.5/trunk/com_easysdi_monitor/language/admin/fr-FR.com_easysdi_monitor.ini?rev=3110&rev_to=2902

I can do the translation work for french. *Please give me a "go" when no more change on localization file will be done*

**Fixed versions :** 4.0.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

By the way, translation code should be "adapted" to stick to others EasySDI component logic :

NAME-OF-COMPONENT_CODE (example : MONITOR_SAVE_DATA)

Currently, translation code in MONITOR do not respect this pattern.
I open a new ticket for this -> http://forge.easysdi.org/issues/417

**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Hi Xavier,

I guess that such ticket is no more needed anymore.
Thanks

**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

French translation delivered with V4
